name: Developer's Console
author: LazyWizard
description:
An in-game developer's console, currently only functional on the campaign map.
By default the console is activated with tilde (~). The console can be re-bound by pressing Shift+F1.

Compatible with all mods that take place in the Corvus system, as well as Project CAELUS, Project Ironclads, Fight for Universe: Sector Xplo, and Ascendency.
